```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


let's import the `FAS_litters.csv` csv.

```{r}
litters_df=
  read_csv("data/FAS_litters.csv")

litters_df=
  janitor::clean_names(litters_df)
```

Now import the `FAS_pups.csv` csv.

```{r}
pups_df=
  read_csv(file="data/FAS_pups.csv")

pups_df=
  janitor::clean_names(pups_df)
```

## Look at data

```{r}
litters_df

head(litters_df)

tail(litters_df)
```

you can use `view`

```{r, eval(FALSE)}
view(litters_df)

```


Look at a data summary

```{r}
str(litters_df)

skimr::skim(litters_df)
```
